overview: Too rude for TV. Too raunchy for the movies. Too horny for Bobo's mamma. It's Fat Pizza: Uncensored, you stooge! Hit the road with Pauly, Bobo, Rocky and Habib as they travel across Australia looking for some filthy, freaky action in this exclusive, never-before-seen DVD. It's fully sick, mate.
title: Fat Pizza Uncensored
